name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited command-line interfaces to execute unauthorized scripts, leading to compromised data and system manipulations.

action--aef45f88-148f-498b-bd7f-ff0bca38.name: Kill malicious process
action--aef45f88-148f-498b-bd7f-ff0bca38.description: Terminate the suspicious processes executing on the system.

action--b7d43516-cf92-459e-9b98-40adb2a9.name: Remove dropped files
action--b7d43516-cf92-459e-9b98-40adb2a9.description: Remove any dropped malicious files from the system.

loop--remove-files-loop.name: Loop to check and remove dropped files
loop--remove-files-loop.description: Repeat the file removal until no more dropped files exist.

action--d2e6e2d2-b2a1-4df9-998f-db2246bd.name: Block malicious IP
action--d2e6e2d2-b2a1-4df9-998f-db2246bd.description: Block inbound connections from the identified malicious IP to prevent further access.
